issue.title: [CF 451] OmniCC group options don't work with 5.0.0
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Install TMW 5.0.0
2. Create OmniCC custom group with "TellMeWhen" rule with TellMeWhen rule.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Custom group settings from OmniCC to apply. Instead default OmniCC settings are used.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
5.0.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Seems like OmniCC no longer recognizes newest version of TellMeWhen to apply custom group formatting. It was working fine with 4.8.3 version. OmniCC config file attached.


> Posted by CurseForge user nlvyper | Imported from CurseForge issue #451 | Raw

comments.body:

OmniCC.lua
